entries.title: NYC hospitals prep for nurse strike amid negotiations
entries.description: Negotiations to keep 10,000 nurses from walking off the job are heading into a final weekend

entries.title: Man sentenced to record-breaking 20 years in prison in fentanyl death of teenager
entries.description: A man was sentenced to 20 years in prison for the death of a 19-year-old who bought what appeared to be prescription oxycodone pills that actually contained fentanyl.

entries.title: Hawaii volcano eruption continues as alert level lowered
entries.description: Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano continues erupting

entries.title: WATCH:  Watch emotional moment 14-year-old embraces dad after release from prison
entries.description: "Your kids are doing harder time than you," said David O'dell Arnold Jr., who was in prison for nearly 9 years. "It's not worth it, please don't do it."

entries.title: Ex-Southern Cal official gets 6 months in college bribe case
entries.description: A former University of Southern California athletics department official who accepted bribes from the ringleader of the nationwide college admissions bribery scandal to help get often unqualified students into the school as sports recruits has been sen...

entries.title: Teacher injured in shooting at elementary school, suspect in custody
entries.description: A teacher was injured in a shooting at an elementary school in Virginia, Friday, police said.

entries.title: Arizona's shipping container wall on border is coming down
entries.description: Former Republican Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey’s border barrier of shipping containers has been largely dismantled just in time for a new Democratic administration, costing tens of millions of dollars over just a few months while they were set up and taken ...

entries.title: Utah town grieves murder-suicide that left 8 dead, including 5 children
entries.description: Authorities allege a father killed seven and himself amid a divorce proceeding.

entries.title: FDA grants accelerated approval to Alzheimer's drug
entries.description: The FDA has granted accelerated approval to a new Alzheimer's drug.

entries.title: US to send $3.75B in military aid to Ukraine, its neighbors
entries.description: The White House has announced a new $3.75 billion military assistance package to help Ukraine and its neighbors on NATO's eastern flank as Russia’s invasion of Ukraine grinds on

entries.title: Twitter leak exposes 235 million email addresses from hack
entries.description: Personal emails linked to 235 million Twitter accounts hacked some time ago have been exposed according to Israeli security researcher Alon Gal — making millions vulnerable to having their accounts compromised or identities exposed if they have used th...

entries.title: Ex-lawmaker who served time for Jan. 6 riot seeks House seat
entries.description: A former West Virginia lawmaker who served three months in prison for his participation in the Jan. 6th Capitol riot says he's running for Congress

entries.title: Romania seizes more cars in Tate case; court next week
entries.description: Romanian authorities have seized four more luxury vehicles for a total of 15 that have been seized in the investigation into Andrew Tate

entries.title: Southwest Airlines holiday meltdown will cost company up to $825 million
entries.description: Southwest Airlines canceled more than 16,000 flights over 11 days, a government filing said.

entries.title: Iranian drone maker sanctioned for supplying Moscow
entries.description: The U.S. has hit six executives and board members of an Iranian drone manufacturer with sanctions after the firm allegedly supplied Moscow with drones that Russian forces have been using to attack Ukraine

entries.title: Fuel leak in Virginia shuts down part of Colonial Pipeline
entries.description: The Colonial Pipeline says a diesel fuel leak in Virginia has shut down part of the nation’s largest fuel pipeline, but it is expected to restart Saturday

entries.title: 'Real Housewives' star Jen Shah sentenced to 6 1/2 years in prison
entries.description: "Real Housewives of Salt Lake City" star Jen Shah has been sentenced to 6 1/2 years in prison in a high-profile telemarketing fraud case.

entries.title: Judge orders Wisconsin DOJ agent to stand trial in shooting
entries.description: A Wisconsin Department of Justice agent who wounded an unarmed Black man during a Madison traffic stop last year has been ordered to stand trial

entries.title: Alex Jones lawyer suspended 6 months over records release
entries.description: A lawyer for conspiracy theorist Alex Jones has been suspended from practicing law in Connecticut for six months

entries.title: Stealing home? Man accused of burglarizing Brewers clubhouse
entries.description: Prosecutors have charged a 25-year-old man with felony burglary after he allegedly stole memorabilia and other items from the Milwaukee Brewers clubhouse at American Family Field

entries.title: Grammy winner accused of assault, kidnapping fatally shot
entries.description: Authorities say a Grammy-winning sound engineer accused of kidnapping and threatening his wife and stepdaughter at gunpoint in Tennessee has been fatally shot by police

entries.title: Ukraine reclaims Kyiv cathedral amid church dispute
entries.description: The Ukrainian government has taken the main cathedral of the revered historic Orthodox monastery from the church previously affiliated with Moscow’s patriarchate and allowed its Ukrainian rival to use it for Orthodox Christmas services

entries.title: 'It broke me': Capitol officer describes recurring trauma of Jan. 6 attack
entries.description: U.S. Capitol Police officer Harry Dunn told ABC Chief Justice Correspondent Pierre Thomas he still feels the emotional pain of Jan. 6.

entries.title: WATCH:  Herd of elk trots through field in Oregon
entries.description: A herd of elk was seen trotting through a field in Hillsboro, Oregon, set against the stunning backdrop of a sunrise.

entries.title: WATCH:  Alert level raised as Kilauea volcano eruption resumes on Hawaii's Big Island
entries.description: Kilauea's volcano alert level has been elevated from “watch” to “warning” as eruption resumes on Hawaii's Big Island.

entries.title: US hiring stays brisk as employers add 223,000 jobs
entries.description: America’s employers added a solid 223,000 jobs in December, evidence that the economy remains healthy yet also a sign that the Federal Reserve may still have to raise interest rates aggressively to slow growth and cool inflation

entries.title: Cubans crossing into US stunned to hear of new asylum limits
entries.description: Migrants entering the U.S. illegally are devastated to learn they may be sent back to Mexico under expanded limits on the pursuit of asylum

entries.title: Democratic officials' homes, offices, shot up in New Mexico
entries.description: Police in New Mexico say the homes or offices of four elected Democratic officials in the Albuquerque area have been hit by gunfire over the past month

entries.title: 2 convicted over carbon monoxide poisoning at Norwegian rave
entries.description: Two men have been convicted over an illegal rave in Oslo that came to an abrupt end when dozens of people were taken to hospitals with carbon monoxide poisoning

entries.title: 'Real Housewives of Salt Lake City' member faces sentencing
entries.description: Federal prosecutors are seeking a 10-year prison sentence for a member of “The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City” who they say lived lavishly after defrauding thousands of people nationwide in a telemarketing scam, many of them elderly

entries.title: Body armor shields Border Patrol agent struck by gunfire
entries.description: Federal authorities say a Border Patrol agent in body armor was struck by gunfire but not seriously hurt while confronting the occupants of a vehicle suspected of smuggling migrants in New Mexico

entries.title: Michigan State football player pleads guilty to misdemeanors
entries.description: A Michigan State football player has pleaded guilty to misdemeanors for a skirmish inside the Michigan Stadium tunnel after a game in October

entries.title: Kilauea volcano eruption resumes on Hawaii's Big Island
entries.description: Last month, both Kilauea, one of the most active volcanos in the world, and Mauna Loa, the largest volcano in the world, ignited the landscape of Hawaii's Big Island.

entries.title: Judge considers sanctioning Trump's lawyers in ongoing New York $250M civil lawsuit
entries.description: Judge Arthur Engoron, in an email to the attorneys, said he "is considering imposing sanctions for frivolous litigation" over Trump's motion to dismiss the lawsuit.

entries.title: Paralyzed House worsens outlook for chaos in era of divided government: ANALYSIS
entries.description: However Republicans' fight for the House speakership ultimately ends, the intraparty trench warfare will not impact solely the GOP or the new Congress

entries.title: Former judge arrested for allegedly soliciting sex from defendant's girlfriend
entries.description: Thomas Carruth has denied any wrongdoing.
